review: So far, so good! We have been using Chromecast for a couple years now. I like the layout and ease of use of the Fire TV Stick better.
author: WaterSki2011

review: The menu is great but streaming can be glitch even with great WIFI signal.
author: jeremy nelson

review: The fire TV stick seemed generally good in the begining but within a week the remote has started malfunctioning. The response time for remote is very bad now. I am managing with the mobile remote app. Lets see how reliable the fire stick is overall. If anymore malfunction I will return it.
author: Abinash Das

review: Easy installation and set up! It came a few weeks before I expected it! Next step...getting rid of cable!
author: Sue J

review: I like the Amazon fire stick because of the access to my Amazon prime movies and apps like Hulu. I gave it 4 stars because I expected an all one remote experience. I think that the remote should have quick buttons to maneuver to popular apps like Vudu. I was unhappy that Vudu wasn't available because I have so many movies on my account. Overall it loads faster then the Roku but lacks the apps most movies lovers like to view. Games are a plus and I'll eventually purchase the game controller.
author: Wayne

review: Love it love it! Buying it for others for Christmas!
author: Amy

review: I truly like this device, but it has not developed into love just yet. There are some issues with video playback - especially in Hulu Plus. However, I'm hoping that with some updates to address these issues, this device will be a five star rating, easy.
